meanings.definition: The foundation or base of a road.
meanings.sent1: The roadbeds were strong and sturdy, supporting the entire road above.
meanings.sent2: The construction workers laid gravel on the roadbeds before paving the road.
meanings.sent3: The roadbeds decided to have a race to see who could hold up the road the longest.
meanings.sent4: The roadbeds of our friendship have been tested through thick and thin.
meanings.sent5: The roadbeds were like the backbone of the road, providing strength and stability.

meanings.definition: The surface on which a road is constructed.
meanings.sent1: The roadbeds were smooth and even, making the drive pleasant for travelers.
meanings.sent2: The road crew worked tirelessly to ensure the roadbeds were level and well-maintained.
meanings.sent3: The roadbeds threw a party to celebrate being the foundation of a new road in town.
meanings.sent4: The roadbeds stretched out like a ribbon, guiding vehicles on their journey.
meanings.sent5: The roadbeds gleamed under the sun, inviting drivers to follow their path.
